document.full_text: a massive selloff on the tokyo stock exchange wiped out some 23.5 trillion yen ($287 billion) from the market's value on monday with investors dumping stocks as the country recoiled...
document.title: quake selloff wipes $287 billion off tokyo stock market
lines_and_colors: a massive selloff on the tokyo stock exchange wiped out some 23.5 trillion yen ($287 billion) from the market's value on monday with investors dumping stocks as the country recoiled...
